# Copilot / AI Agent Instructions

Provide our Customers the possible best answers regarding our services, features, and other related information about Dhobiapp Dry Cleaners.

# About Dhobiapp Dry Cleaners

Dhobiapp Dry Cleaners is a modern laundry and dry cleaning service dedicated to providing high-quality garment care with convenience and reliability. Our platform allows users to schedule pickups, track orders, and receive professional cleaning for clothes, linens, and more. We focus on eco-friendly processes, customer satisfaction, and seamless digital experiences for both residential and commercial clients.

This repository powers the Dhobiapp website, showcasing our services, mission, and contact options. Please ensure all content and features reflect the brand values of trust, quality, and innovation.
